subject: Final Report on Alec's Intelligence Project...
author: Guy
full_text:
Well - Alec sent me an edited version which he feels can be released 
and not upset Bial BUT...the graphics are missing. So rather than post 
it as is - I'll try to get another one from him (due to NUMEROUS 
problems with his home ISP, he works out of an Internet cafe so it can 
take some time for him to reply as he gets a LOT of e-mail traffic...)

Guy
